alert.note: Alert for Hughes (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:30PM CDT until May 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL HUGHES COUNTY... At 630 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southeast of Horntown, moving south at 20 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR central Hughes County. HAZARD...Three inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Calvin, Stuart, Lamar, Horntown, Yeager and Atwood. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...3.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
